item.title: Okta Email
item.description: Add the Okta email authenticator In Phase 1?: “Yes, it’s existing content requiring little to no change” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Dimensioned by: Language Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: ‘- Okta email (magic link/OTP) integration guide: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/authenticators-okta-email/aspnet/main/ Content type: Integration guide

item.title: Custom authenticator
item.description: Add the Custom authenticator In Phase 1?: “Yes, it’s existing content requiring little to no change” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Dimensioned by: Language Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Custom authenticator integration guide: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/authenticators-custom-authenticator/android/main/ Content type: Integration guide Goal-oriented. Similar to a how-to but the focus is more technical and geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.
